verses.verse: בַּשְּׁבִיעִ֕י <WH7637> In the seventh בְּעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> [month] in the one לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by חַגַּ֥י <WH2292> Haggai הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֱמָר־ <WH559> Speak נָ֗א <WH4994> now אֶל־ <WH413> to זְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <WH2216> now to Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵל֙ <WH7597> of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <WH6346> governor יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> and to Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹצָדָ֖ק <WH3087> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> the high וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> and to the residue הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

מִ֤י <WH4310> Who בָכֶם֙ הַנִּשְׁאָ֔ר <WH7604> Who [is] left אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who רָאָה֙ <WH7200> among you that saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> this house הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this בִּכְבוֹד֖וֹ <WH3519> glorious הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> in her first וּמָ֨ה <WH4100> how long אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> you רֹאִ֤ים <WH7200> see אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> עַ֔תָּה <WH6258> henceforth הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> not כָמֹ֛הוּ <WH3644> in comparison כְּאַ֖יִן <WH369> nothing בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> it now? [is it] not in your eyes

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now חֲזַ֣ק <WH2388> Yet now be strong זְרֻבָּבֶ֣ל ׀ <WH2216> O Zerubbabel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> the LORD וַחֲזַ֣ק <WH2388> and be strong יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> O Joshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> son יְהוֹצָדָק֩ <WH3087> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> the high וַחֲזַ֨ק <WH2388> and be strong כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֥ם <WH5971> all ye people הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וַֽעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> and work כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> for נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> for I [am] with you saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֞ר <WH1697> [According to] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which כָּרַ֤תִּי <WH3772> that I covenanted אִתְּכֶם֙ <WH854> for בְּצֵאתְכֶ֣ם <WH3318> with you when ye came מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וְרוּחִ֖י <WH7307> so my spirit עֹמֶ֣דֶת <WH5975> remaineth בְּתוֹכְכֶ֑ם <WH8432> among אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּירָֽאוּ׃ <WH3372> you fear ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts ע֥וֹד <WH5750> more אַחַ֖ת <WH259> Yet once מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> it [is] a little while הִ֑יא <WH1931> he וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I am מַרְעִישׁ֙ <WH7493> and I will shake אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> the heavens וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and the earth וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> and the sea וְאֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָרָבָֽה׃ <WH2724> and the dry

וְהִרְעַשְׁתִּי֙ <WH7493> And I will shake אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> all nations וּבָ֖אוּ <WH935> shall come חֶמְדַּ֣ת <WH2532> and the desire כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of all nations וּמִלֵּאתִ֞י <WH4390> and I will fill אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this כָּב֔וֹד <WH3519> with glory אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts
לִ֥י הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> The silver וְלִ֣י הַזָּהָ֑ב <WH2091> [is] mine and the gold נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> [is] mine saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> shall be greater than יִֽהְיֶ֡ה <WH1961> become כְּבוֹד֩ <WH3519> The glory הַבַּ֨יִת <WH1004> house הַזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> of this הָאַֽחֲרוֹן֙ <WH314> of this latter מִן־ <WH4480> than הָ֣רִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> of the former אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וּבַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> and in this place הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> will I give שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> peace נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts פ

בְּעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָה֙ <WH702> In the four לַתְּשִׁיעִ֔י <WH8671> [day] of the ninth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> [month] in the second לְדָרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to חַגַּ֥י <WH2292> Haggai הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁאַל־ <WH7592> Ask נָ֧א <WH4994> now אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> now the priests תּוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> [concerning] the law לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הֵ֣ן ׀ <WH2005> If יִשָּׂא־ <WH5375> bear אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> If one בְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> flesh קֹ֜דֶשׁ <WH6944> holy בִּכְנַ֣ף <WH3671> in the skirt בִּגְד֗וֹ <WH899> of his garment וְנָגַ֣ע <WH5060> do touch בִּ֠כְנָפוֹ <WH3671> and with his skirt אֶל־ <WH413> about הַלֶּ֨חֶם <WH3899> bread וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הַנָּזִ֜יד <WH5138> or pottage וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַיַּ֧יִן <WH3196> or wine וְאֶל־ <WH413> about שֶׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> or oil וְאֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> any מַאֲכָ֖ל <WH3978> or any meat הֲיִקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH6942> shall it be holy וַיַּעֲנ֧וּ <WH6030> answered הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> ? And the priests וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and said לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> No

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said חַגַּ֔י <WH2292> Haggai אִם־ <WH518> If יִגַּ֧ע <WH5060> touch טְמֵא־ <WH2931> If [one that is] unclean נֶ֛פֶשׁ <WH5315> by a dead body בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these הֲיִטְמָ֑א <WH2930> any of these shall it be unclean וַיַּעֲנ֧וּ <WH6030> answered הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> ? And the priests וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and said יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> It shall be unclean

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> Then answered חַגַּ֜י <WH2292> Haggai וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So הָֽעָם־ <WH5971> So [is] this people הַ֠זֶּה <WH2088> is this וְכֵן־ <WH3651> and so הַגּ֨וֹי <WH1471> and so [is] this nation הַזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> is this לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> before נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> and so כָּל־ <WH3605> is every מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> and so [is] every work יְדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3027> of their hands וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and what יַקְרִ֛יבוּ <WH7126> and that which they offer שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> there [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now שִֽׂימוּ־ <WH7760> was laid נָ֣א <WH4994> I beseech thee לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> heart מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> from this day הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward מִטֶּ֧רֶם <WH2962> from before שֽׂוּם־ <WH7760> was placed אֶ֛בֶן <WH68> a stone אֶל־ <WH413> on אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> upon a stone בְּהֵיכַ֥ל <WH1964> in the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

מִֽהְיוֹתָ֥ם <WH1961> time בָּא֙ <WH935> Since those [days] were when [one] came אֶל־ <WH413> about עֲרֵמַ֣ת <WH6194> to an heap עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> of twenty וְהָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> time עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> [measures] there were [but] ten בָּ֣א <WH935> when [one] came אֶל־ <WH413> to הַיֶּ֗קֶב <WH3342> to the pressfat לַחְשֹׂף֙ <WH2834> for to draw out חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> fifty פּוּרָ֔ה <WH6333> [vessels] out of the press וְהָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> time עֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> there were [but] twenty

הִכֵּ֨יתִי <WH5221> I smote אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> בַּשִּׁדָּפ֤וֹן <WH7711> you with blasting וּבַיֵּֽרָקוֹן֙ <WH3420> and with mildew וּבַבָּרָ֔ד <WH1259> and with hail אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> you every מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> in all the labours יְדֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3027> of your hands וְאֵין־ <WH369> else אֶתְכֶ֥ם <WH853> אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> yet ye [turned] not to me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

שִׂימוּ־ <WH7760> appoint נָ֣א <WH4994> I beseech thee לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> heart מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> now from this day הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward מִיּוֹם֩ <WH3117> day עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֜ה <WH702> from the four לַתְּשִׁיעִ֗י <WH8671> of the ninth לְמִן־ <WH4480> at הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> [month even] from the day אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> when יֻסַּ֥ד <WH3245> that the foundation הֵֽיכַל־ <WH1964> temple יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> appoint לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <WH3824> heart

הַע֤וֹד <WH5750> still הַזֶּ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> Is the seed בַּמְּגוּרָ֔ה <WH4035> barn וְעַד־ <WH5704> including הַגֶּ֨פֶן <WH1612> the vine וְהַתְּאֵנָ֧ה <WH8384> and the fig tree וְהָרִמּ֛וֹן <WH7416> and the pomegranate וְעֵ֥ץ <WH6086> tree הַזַּ֖יִת <WH2132> and the olive לֹ֣א <WH3808> has not נָשָׂ֑א <WH5375> hath not brought forth מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> from this day הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אֲבָרֵֽךְ׃ <WH1288> will I bless ס

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD שֵׁנִית֙ <WH8145> And again אֶל־ <WH413> to חַגַּ֔י <WH2292> came unto Haggai בְּעֶשְׂרִ֧ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <WH702> in the four לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֱמֹ֕ר <WH559> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to זְרֻבָּבֶ֥ל <WH2216> to Zerubbabel פַּֽחַת־ <WH6346> governor יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am מַרְעִ֔ישׁ <WH7493> I will shake אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> the heavens וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and the earth

וְהָֽפַכְתִּי֙ <WH2015> And I will overthrow כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> the throne מַמְלָכ֔וֹת <WH4467> of kingdoms וְהִ֨שְׁמַדְתִּ֔י <WH8045> and I will destroy חֹ֖זֶק <WH2392> the strength מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> of the kingdoms הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen וְהָפַכְתִּ֤י <WH2015> and I will overthrow מֶרְכָּבָה֙ <WH4818> the chariots וְרֹ֣כְבֶ֔יהָ <WH7392> and those that ride וְיָרְד֤וּ <WH3381> shall come down סוּסִים֙ <WH5483> in them and the horses וְרֹ֣כְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7392> and their riders אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> of his brother

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֣וּא <WH1931> you' נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֡וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֶ֠קָּחֲךָ <WH3947> will I take זְרֻבָּבֶ֨ל <WH2216> thee O Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵ֤ל <WH7597> of Shealtiel עַבְדִּי֙ <WH5650> my servant נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךָ <WH7760> and will make כַּֽחוֹתָ֑ם <WH2368> thee as a signet כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְךָ֣ בָחַ֔רְתִּי <WH977> for I have chosen נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> thee saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts
